page.title: 14A DAY IN THE LIFE OF ANDREW.
page.content: Another hectic day begins.My brother says,"Mum it's seven o'clock."and I wake up to kettle boiling and taps running.I get up, walk down stairs in to the kitchen, that is the most hectic room.My dog is running about knocking over the bin.My Mum shouts at my brother,tells me and him to stop arguing and throws the cat out just after it came in! My Dad is off to work and my brother is off to school, 8.30am I am out of the house. 3.30pm back home,4.15pm my brother is back home.He leaves his stuff by the door, gets crisps and milk and then sits down. Then my Mum makes the tea.9.00pm I go to bed and my Dad is still not home.Later I waken,I hear my Mum talking to my Dad, the time is 12.30am so I go back to sleep. by ANDREW ROGERS.
